groovy.de.datenwissen.util.groovyrdf.core
[Groovy] Interface RdfLoader

interface RdfLoader

Loads RdfData over HTTP using content negotiation

Method Summary
RdfData load(java.lang.String uri)

Load RDF data from the given URI
RdfResource loadResource(java.lang.String uri)

Load RDF data from the given URI but returns only the resource identified by that URI.
 

Method Detail

load

RdfData load(java.lang.String uri)
Load RDF data from the given URI
throws:
RdfParsingException If the response could not be parsed
throws:
RdfLoadingException If no RDF data could not be loaded
Parameters:
uri - The URI to load the data from
Returns:
The retrieved data as RdfData

loadResource

RdfResource loadResource(java.lang.String uri)
Load RDF data from the given URI but returns only the resource identified by that URI.
throws:
RdfParsingException If the response could not be parsed
throws:
RdfLoadingException If no RDF data could not be loaded
Parameters:
uri - uri The URI to load the data from
Returns:
The RdfResource represented by the given URI
